channel.title: Pur3z525 [525]
channel.description:
B]It's based of revengescape at first very bad source Because there were Disconnections and resets but that's fixed :)
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/27xmcs9.j[/img]
[img]http://i566.photobucket.com/albums/ss105/jessicapker/Hoster.jpg[/img]
Features of 'Pur3z525[525]Beta'.
[COLOR="Green"][FONT="Arial"]- Skulls working 100% - All specs workin With real spec bar + Draining and refilling using our OWN method. - PvP Drops in Varrock Wildy (It's free for all there - Basic lunar magic + working veng - Defence with defence anims - Real maxhits - made PM better by adding the green online text. - Added the real pvp Gfx like Runescape. - Piety works(+23%damage) - Full dharok/ Full void melee/ Full void range works - Wildernes levels and real old wild pk places - Alot of specs. Soon adding g maul near 99% real one.(it was no delay to att so u can hit spec spec =p). - Vengeance - Fully workin Banking - Auto retailate workin. - Real Drops in BH - BH Workin - NEW:PRIVATE CHAT - TRADING - Super str pot(item 2440) - Commands - Magic on player Including Ice barrage + Miasmic Barrage. - Bonuses on interface - Castle wars home - Castle wars tele's u to BH , Varrock Wildy where it's free for all. - Fully working mage bank. - master wands as people were requesting it. - Snowpk pk area :) - added ice blitz -added miasmic burst -added ice burst [/FONT][/COLOR]
[b]video's:[/b] [img]http://img188.imageshack.us/img188/6463/naamloosy.png[/img]
[img]http://img34.imageshack.us/img34/4107/tehfinalpur3z.png[/img]
[b]video's:[/b]
http://www.youtube.com/jessicapker
[b]clan wars:[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pp-5moo_oyo
[b]cool fight:[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_FinHUPzCVw&feature=channel_page
[B]goals:[/B] full ancient spellbook

item.description:
@ggggg wrote:

B]It’s based of revengescape at first very bad source Because there were Disconnections and resets but that’s fixed

Features of ‘Pur3z525[525]Beta’.

[COLOR=“Green”][FONT=“Arial”]- Skulls working 100%

  • All specs workin With real spec bar + Draining and refilling using our OWN method.
  • PvP Drops in Varrock Wildy (It’s free for all there
  • Basic lunar magic + working veng
  • Defence with defence anims
  • Real maxhits
  • made PM better by adding the green online text.
  • Added the real pvp Gfx like Runescape.
  • Piety works(+23%damage)
  • Full dharok/ Full void melee/ Full void range works
  • Wildernes levels and real old wild pk places
  • Alot of specs. Soon adding g maul near 99% real one.(it was no delay to att so u can hit spec spec =p).
  • Vengeance
  • Fully workin Banking
  • Auto retailate workin.
  • Real Drops in BH
  • BH Workin
  • NEW:PRIVATE CHAT
  • TRADING
  • Super str pot(item 2440)
  • Commands
  • Magic on player Including Ice barrage + Miasmic Barrage.
  • Bonuses on interface
  • Castle wars home
  • Castle wars tele’s u to BH , Varrock Wildy where it’s free for all.
  • Fully working mage bank.
  • master wands as people were requesting it.
  • Snowpk pk area
  • added ice blitz
    -added miasmic burst
    -added ice burst
    [/FONT][/COLOR]
